app_name: Groups Treatment Groups Apple Translate Text Voice Translate
app_description: With Text Voice Translate you can communicate with people who do not speak you languages. Help you to communicate effectively in any corner of the world. Instantly speak in more than 30 languages! Features: Apple Speech Recognition Technology realtime voice recognition. Photo translation: Take photos for higher quality translations. 30 supported languages for text to text and voice to voice translations. Search histories. Speaks out translations. the app will instantly speak our translations. Share translations via email message or social Network. translations are supported between the following languages: Arabic Catalan Chinese Croatian Czech Danish Dutch English Finnish French German Greek Hungarian Indonesian Italian Japanese Korean Malay Polish Portuguese Romanian Russian Slovak Spanish Swedish Thai Turkish Ukrainian Vietnamese
